meta.project: Personal Developer Portfolio Website for Aditya Paswan

product_overview: This project is a personal developer portfolio website to showcase Aditya Paswan's skills, experience, projects, and contact information. It targets potential employers and collaborators by presenting a modern, clean, and professional web presence with responsive design and smooth animations using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.
core_goals: Create a high-performance, responsive portfolio that works on all devices with a mobile-first approach.
Showcase professional background, skills, and projects effectively with clear navigation and visual appeal.
Provide easy access to download resume and contact the developer through the website.
Implement modern UI/UX with dark mode color schemes and smooth animations for an engaging user experience.
key_features: Hero Section with a prominent introduction, resume download button, and social media icons.
Projects Section displaying live demos and project showcases in a responsive grid layout with hover effects for GitHub links.
Skills Marquee featuring a scrolling or badge-based display of technical skills.
Experience and Education sections highlighting background and certifications.
Contact form with mailto fallback for visitor inquiries.
Responsive, sticky navigation bar with a collapsible hamburger menu for mobile users.
Dark mode theme with deep slate/navy backgrounds and electric blue or vibrant purple accent colors for a software developer vibe.
user_flow_summary: User lands on the homepage and is greeted by the Hero Section showcasing name, tagline, and contact options.
User navigates through the sticky navigation bar to sections: About, Experience, Projects, Certifications, and Contact.
In Projects section, user views a grid of project cards. Hovering on a card reveals a button linking to the project's GitHub repository.
User browses Skills marquee to visualize technology stack expertise.
User fills contact form or uses provided email/phone details to reach out to Aditya.
User can download the developer's resume via the hero section button.
validation_criteria: The portfolio site correctly displays all provided content data including profile, social links, education, skills, experience, projects, and certifications.
Responsive layout adapts seamlessly across different screen sizes from mobile to desktop.
All project cards show correct data and links to GitHub repositories function on hover.
Contact form or mailto links function correctly for message sending.
Navigation bar is sticky and collapsible on smaller screens.
Dark mode color palette is consistently applied with correct typography and spacing.
Animations using Framer Motion are implemented for smooth transitions without performance degradation.
